CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Golden Harvest Cooperative relative to Misty Meadow Acres?
SRP.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative is {below} Misty Meadow Acres in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Whispering Willows Estate relative to Misty Meadow Acres?
SRP.A: Whispering Willows Estate is {above} Misty Meadow Acres in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Misty Meadow Acres relative to Whispering Willows Estate?
SRP.A: Misty Meadow Acres is {below} Whispering Willows Estate in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total crop yield?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Golden Harvest Cooperative}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total crop yield?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Whispering Willows Estate}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Golden Harvest Cooperative's maximum Crop Yield in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative's maximum Crop Yield is in {2005}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Misty Meadow Acres's minimum Crop Yield in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Misty Meadow Acres's minimum Crop Yield is in {2004}.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2004, did the total Crop Yield experience a larger or smaller change than between 2004 and 2005?
NC.A: The change in total crop yield between 2000 and 2004 was {smaller} than between 2004 and 2005.

NC.Q: Was the total Crop Yield in 1995 higher or lower than in 2004?
NC.A: The total crop yield in 1995 was {lower} than in 2004.

NC.Q: Between 2001 and 2004, did the total Crop Yield experience a larger or smaller change than between 1995 and 2003?
NC.A: The change in total crop yield between 2001 and 2004 was {larger} than between 1995 and 2003.

NC.Q: Between 2001 and 2005, was the average total Crop Yield higher or lower than between 1998 and 2003?
NC.A: The average total crop yield between 2001 and 2005 was {higher} than between 1998 and 2003.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Golden Harvest Cooperative} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Whispering Willows Estate and Misty Meadow Acres first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Whispering Willows Estate and Misty Meadow Acres did not exchange leading positions.
